@@ -1,17 +1,26 @@
+// models/Bid.js
 const mongoose = require("mongoose");
 
 const bidSchema = new mongoose.Schema({
   gigId: {
     type: mongoose.Schema.Types.ObjectId,
-    ref: "Gig"
+    ref: "Gig",
+    required: true
   },
   freelancerId: {
     type: mongoose.Schema.Types.ObjectId,
-    ref: "User"
+    ref: "User",
+    required: true
   },
-  message: String,
-  price: Number,
+  message: {
+    type: String,
+    required: true
+  },
+  price: {
+    type: Number,
+    required: true
+  },
   status: {
     type: String,
     enum: ["pending", "hired", "rejected"],
     default: "pending"
